content: this naturally dyed shawl was designed while i was on an adventure in the north i went away and needed something to keep me warm i really do terribly in the cold and snow i tried snowshoeing and fell in love with it until an incident involving me and a tree-well i also went cross country skiing and has a small accident involving my head going one way and my body going the other seriously i do so poorly in winter it is a lace object made chunky to keep you warm and happy it used just one skein of yarn but the yarn is 1/2 lb of naturally dyed yarns from we will tell you all of our secrets and is available at baaad anna s yarn store www baaadannas com thank you to softsweater for the photos http //softsweaterfibres blogspot ca/ want to see my adventures thesesecrets com
